headline: How Halliburton’s AI-Enabled Indonesia Fracturing Pact with Pertamina Could Impact Halliburton (HAL) Investors
summary: In February 2026, PT Pertamina (Persero) announced it had signed a memorandum of understanding with Halliburton to accelerate advanced well construction and stimulation technologies in Indonesia, including multi-stage hydraulic fracturing, acid stimulation, advanced cementing, and potential closed-loop automation and artificial intelligence applications in selected onshore fields. This collaboration highlights Halliburton’s push to widen its unconventional completions presence in Southeast...
